greeting.title: Hi!
greeting.description:
Thank you for adding me to your server!
Here's some information you need to know before using me:

I use slash commands. Just type `/` and you'll see all of them!

My functionality is divided into modules. Use `/module enable` command to enable modules you need.

Language can be changed using `/language` command.

Feel free to join [support server]({{monoLoungeLink}}) if you have any questions or suggestions!

noSlashCommandScope: Looks like you added me without a permission to create slash commands here! Try to add me again using button in my profile.
